name: Oatmeal Cake
ingredients: 1 cup quick oats ½ tsp salt
1 cup brown sugar 1 ½ cup flour
steps: ½ cup butter ½ tsp ground cloves
Preheat oven to 375. Grease and flour a 9 x 13 pan. Bring water and butter to a boil. Stir in oatmeal and set
aside. Mix both sugars, nutmeg, cinnamon, cloves, salt, baking soda, ad flour together. Stir in oatmeal mixture
and eggs. Pour into prepared pan and bake 35-­‐45 minutes. Topping: Heat the butter, milk, and brown sugar
until butter is melted and sugar is dissolved. Stir in coconuts and nuts. Pour over cake while warm.
